alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 4:01PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Nueces and north central Kleberg Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 400 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 11 miles west of South Texas Botanical Gardens, or 11 miles southeast of Driscoll. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Petronila and Chapman Ranch. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Corpus Christi.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces
